title: Make login button text bold in admin login screen

requirements.text: Apply bold font weight to the login button text in the admin authentication screen at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/a[1]/button[1]

quotes: Login button with bold design text

acceptanceCriteria: The login button text displays with bold font weight (font-weight-bold or font-weight-700)
The styling change applies only to the selected login button element
The button remains visually consistent with the Ayurvedic design theme

constraints: Only modify the login button styling; do not change authentication logic or other UI elements
Maintain the existing Ayurvedic theme color palette and design consistency
nonGoals: Changing the authentication flow or login functionality
Modifying other buttons or text elements not specified
Altering the store banner background mentioned in earlier messages
